title: Comparative Analysis of Organizational Cultures in Higher Education Institutions: Public vs. Private Institutions

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental concepts in organizational management and educational institution operations
context.additional_context: Participants are working professionals in managerial roles in language education, focusing on understanding cultural differences between public/private higher education institutions and exploring job application strategies

learning_goals: Compare and explain the four types of organizational cultures (clan, adhocracy, hierarchy, market) in public and private higher education institutions
Apply a framework to analyze institutional characteristic differences using the Competing Values Framework (CVF) organizational culture diagnostic tool
Establish culture improvement strategies for the institution based on research findings and derive actionable recommendations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
